channel.title: So what do you guys think about this
channel.description:
[b]Low level pking server[/b]
[b]M[b]ax combat is 60[/b]
Xp would be somewhat easy maybe around 10x[/b]
[b]The only way you can have defense in the wilderness is if your attack and strength are the same number[/b] ( 40 40 40 30 30 30 ) I know this takes away from the different accounts people make but if it is not enforced will result in defense noobs etc.
[b]Things like 2hs and amulets would be valuable but food would be given from an npc[/b]
[b]Main pking spot would be varrock or edge[/b]
[b]Your account can not have magic if you have defense and if you are over the combat of 20 [/b] ( again takes away from the way from rsc feel but people will abuse it.)
[b]F2p because p2p arrows are overpowered[/b]
[b]Upon entering the wild you may not leave for 5 seconds.[/b] ( to prevent bordering ,if someone goes in they will be stuck in so be wise when you do go in.)
These are just some ideas that been in my head for a bit , if you like / dislike any don't be afraid to criticize or say what you like about it.

item.title: So what do you guys think about this
item.dc:creator: @iamjash iamjash
item.description:
@iamjash wrote:

Low level pking server

[b]Max combat is 60

Xp would be somewhat easy maybe around 10x[/b]

The only way you can have defense in the wilderness is if your attack and strength are the same number ( 40 40 40 30 30 30 ) I know this takes away from the different accounts people make but if it is not enforced will result in defense noobs etc.

Things like 2hs and amulets would be valuable but food would be given from an npc

Main pking spot would be varrock or edge

Your account can not have magic if you have defense and if you are over the combat of 20 ( again takes away from the way from rsc feel but people will abuse it.)

F2p because p2p arrows are overpowered

Upon entering the wild you may not leave for 5 seconds. ( to prevent bordering ,if someone goes in they will be stuck in so be wise when you do go in.)

These are just some ideas that been in my head for a bit , if you like / dislike any donâ€™t be afraid to criticize or say what you like about it.
